Updated November     pm



The NCAA investigation involving Husky football coach Rick Neuheisel took another step as the University of Colorado responded to allegations of a  during Neuheisels term as head coach PERIOD

 said Dave Plati sports information director for Colorado PERIOD The university had until last Thursday to respond to the allegations and has no further comment on the investigation PERIOD

The next step is an official hearing in Philadelphia from August  to  when the NCAA will formally present its list of charges and Colorado will have a chance to present its case PERIOD Although the hearing lasts only three days the final decision wont come until about two months later PERIOD

While the UW isnt directly involved in the investigation the University might have to prove why Neuheisels duties as head coach should not be limited if he is deemed irresponsible PERIOD The UW has no comment on the investigation an athletic department spokesman said Monday PERIOD
